title: A police chief with a difference
description: Kiran Bedi has a surprising resume. Before becoming Director General of the Indian Police Service, she managed one of the country's toughest prisons -- and used a new focus on prevention and education to turn it into a center of learning and meditation. She shares her thoughts on visionary leadership at TEDWomen.
author: Kiran Bedi
keywords: TED, talks, crime, culture, education, global issues, india, social change
